name: Hugo
agent_background:
Hugo calls himself a collector and runs a fairly successful gallery, mingling with the "elite" of New Eridu. In truth, he's the leader of the phantom thieves syndicate, Mockingbird — and Lycaon's former partner. Despite his cruel (edgy and dramatic) words, deep down he has his own sense of fairness and justice. Records suggest that Hugo had a troubled childhood. As the illegitimate son of the Ravenlocks, a long-established TOPS family, he was rejected by his mother from an early age because of his heterochromatic eyes. His father bought him back like a cheap commodity, using him to provoke a cutthroat succession battle between his children. In that brutal struggle, the only one kind to Hugo — his sister, Serena — became the first to fall. The ones who orchestrated her death pinned the blame on Hugo, thinking it would destroy him. But to their shock, their father actually praised Hugo's actions, calling them the very traits a worthy heir should possess. After running away from his family, Hugo met Lycaon and Jack and learned to be a phantom thief. After Jack passed away, Hugo and Lycaon formed Mockingbird together. Later, during one of Mockingbird's missions, Hugo came face-to-face with his father. In a brief moment of hesitation, he chose not to take his revenge and kill him — an act of mercy that ended up costing the lives of many innocent people. His close friend Lycaon, due to a misunderstanding born from those circumstances, broke ties with him and ultimately left Mockingbird. After drifting on his own for a while, Hugo met Vivian, a girl who reminded him of his sister Serena. He took her under his wing and reformed the Mockingbird syndicate.

Back during his time with the Ravenlock family, Hugo once ate a piece of cake that his older brother liked. In retaliation, the other children forced him to eat an entire table's worth of desserts. Ever since, the taste of anything sweet makes him want to throw up — likely due to PTSD. But due to his hypoglycemia, he needs sugar to keep his body functioning properly. Hugo forces himself to eat sweets over and over, pushing through the nausea to overcome the pain. Note: Neither Lycaon nor Vivian knows about this, and Hugo once asked you to keep it a secret from them.

basic_attack.name: Dark Abyss Quartet
basic_attack.description:
Perform up to four attacks forward, dealing Physical DMG and Ice DMG.
The fourth attack is a shot. During this attack, hold Basic Attack to charge and perform a charged shot.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the fourth attack, and received damage reduced by 40%.

basic_attack.name: Dark Abyss Concerto
basic_attack.description:
After the 4th hit of Basic Attack: Dark Abyss Quartet, the shot of Dodge Counter: Phantasm - Slash, or the shot of Quick Assist: Elegy, press or hold Basic Attack to activate:
Throw the scythe forward to perform a slash, followed by a shot, dealing Ice DMG.
During the shot, hold Basic Attack to charge and perform a charged shot.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and received damage reduced by 40%.

dodge.name: Phantasm
dodge.description:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Phantasm - Shatter
dash_attack.description: Launch a dashing attack at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Phantasm - Slash
dodge_counter.description:
Performs a series of attacks on enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG.
During the skill, hold Basic Attack to launch a shot. During the shot, hold Basic Attack to charge and perform a charged shot.
The shot is considered a Basic Attack, with its DMG treated as Basic Attack DMG.
After the skill is used, it can be directly followed up with the 4th hit of Basic Attack: Dark Abyss Quartet.
During the skill's ranged phase, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and received damage is reduced by 40%.
Invulnerable during the slashes and ranged retreat of the skill.

quick_assist.name: Elegy
quick_assist.description:
Performs a series of attacks on enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG.
During the skill, hold Basic Attack to launch a shot. During the shot, hold Basic Attack to charge and perform a charged shot.
The shot is considered a Basic Attack, with its DMG treated as Basic Attack DMG.
After the skill is used, it can be directly followed up with the 4th hit of Basic Attack: Dark Abyss Quartet.
During the skill's ranged phase, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and received damage is reduced by 40%.
Invulnerable during the slashes and ranged retreat of the skill.

defensive_assist.name: The End Has Not Come
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Ace Reversal
assist_follow_up.description:
Dash forward and perform two slashes, dealing Ice DMG.
After the skill is used, it can be directly followed up with the 4th hit of Basic Attack: Dark Abyss Quartet.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Soul Hunter - Judgment
special_attack.description:
Spins the scythe and then unleashes a forward slash, dealing Ice DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Soul Hunter - Punishment
ex_special_attack.description:
Spins the scythe and then unleashes a forward slash, dealing Ice DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Trick of Fate
chain_attack.description:
Dash forward to perform a slash across a large area, then launch a shot, dealing massive Ice DMG.
The shot activated by this skill is considered a charged shot.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Blaspheme
ultimate.description:
Dash forward to perform a slash across a large area, then launch a shot, dealing massive Ice DMG.
The shot activated by this skill is considered a charged shot.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Terminating Verdict
core_passive.description:
When Chain Attack: Trick of Fate hits an enemy or Hugo's attacks Stun an enemy, Hugo gains the Dark Abyss Reverb state for 6s, and repeated triggers reset the duration. During this state, Hugo's CRIT Rate increases by 12% and CRIT DMG increases by 25%.
When there are 1/2 Stun characters in your squad, Hugo's ATK increases by 300/900.
When the Finishing Move of EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment or Ultimate: Blaspheme hits an enemy while they are Stunned, it triggers the Totalize effect, increasing the DMG Multiplier of the skill's Finishing Move by 1000%. Additionally, the Totalize effect further increases the skill's DMG multiplier based on the remaining Stun time of the enemy when triggered: for each remaining second of Stun time from the portion that is less than or equal to 5s, the skill's DMG multiplier increases by 280%; for each remaining second of Stun time from the portion between 5 and 15s, the skill's DMG multiplier increases by 100%. The total increase can raise the skill's DMG multiplier by a maximum of 3400%.
After Hugo triggers the Totalize effect, the enemy's Stunned state will immediately end. Based on the remaining Stun time at the moment Totalize is triggered, a certain amount of Daze will be accumulated. For every second of Stun time remaining, 5% Daze is accumulated, up to a maximum Daze equivalent to 25% of the enemy's maximum Daze.
When EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment hits an enemy, if the enemy is not Stunned, the Daze accumulated by the skill increases by 20%.

additional_ability.name: Prelude to Finality
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad is a Stun character or shares the same attribute:
Chain Attack: Trick of Fate's DMG increases by 15%, with a further increase of 35% against normal enemies. When Totalize is triggered, the DMG dealt by the skill increases by 40%. EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment generates an additional 20 Energy when triggering Totalize on normal enemies. The Energy generation effect can trigger once every 30s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Child of Hatred
mindscape_cinema.description: When triggering the Totalize effect in the Dark Abyss Reverb state, the skill's CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 12%, and CRIT DMG by 30%.

mindscape_cinema.name: The Child Within
mindscape_cinema.description:
When Ultimate: Blaspheme triggers Totalize, it will not end the enemy's Stunned state.
Additionally, when Totalize is triggered, the skill will ignore 15% of the enemy's DEF.

mindscape_cinema.name: Fruit of the Poisonous Tree
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Dramatic Theory
mindscape_cinema.description: After a Charged Shot hits an enemy, Hugo's attacks against that target will ignore 12% of that target's Ice RES for 15s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

mindscape_cinema.name: Nirvana
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Crown of Thorns
mindscape_cinema.description:
All shooting attacks that hit enemies trigger the Dark Abyss Reverb state, lasting up to 6s, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
Additionally, whenever any skill triggers the Totalize effect, that DMG is further increased by 60%.
The Finishing Move of EX Special Attack: Soul Hunter - Punishment also triggers the Totalize effect when hitting an enemy that isn't Stunned, boosting the DMG multiplier of the Finishing Move by a fixed 1,000 %.
